mods.note: This collection contains photograph and documents related to the 1967 expansion of Delgado Community College's Moss Memorial Library.
mods.abstract: This collection contains photograph and documents related to the 1967 expansion of Delgado Community College's Moss Memorial Library.
mods.note: The original materials are housed in the archives of Delgado Community College Library.
mods.accessCondition: For information or permission to use/publish, contact cpcir@dcc.edu.
